properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID,USER_PWD,USER_NAME,PHONE,EMAIL,ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE,STATUS,ADMIN,LAWYER FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS) VALUES (SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID =?
SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL =?
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ?, USER_NAME =?, PHONE =?, EMAIL =?, ADDRESS =? WHERE USER_ID=? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE EMAIL =? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET LAWYER = 'W' WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT LAWYER FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT LAW_NO, USER_NAME FROM MEMBER JOIN LAW_USER ON(REF_UNO = USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO IN (SELECT REF_UNO FROM LAW_USER WHERE LAW_NO IN (SELECT REF_LNO FROM DIBS WHERE REF_UNO = ?)) AND STATUS ='Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CREATE_DATE, CATEGORY_NAME FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE BOARD_WRITER = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT RP_NO, REF_BNO, R.CONTENT AS "RP_CONTENT" , R.CREATE_DATE AS "RP_CREATE_DATE", BC.CATEGORY_NAME AS "CATEGORY" FROM REPLY R JOIN BOARD B ON (R.REF_BNO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN BOARD_CATEGORY BC ON(B.CATEGORY_NO = BC.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE RP_WRITER = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CS_NO, CS_TITLE, ACCEPT, CREATE_DATE, CS_ANSWER FROM COUNSEL WHERE CS_WRITER = ?
SELECT REVIEW_NO, REF_ANO, REVIEW_CONTENT,STAR FROM LAW_REVIEW WHERE REF_ANO IN (SELECT ACC_NO FROM ACCIDENT WHERE REF_BNO IN (SELECT BOARD_NO FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_WRITER = ?))

SELECT AR_NO, LAW_NO, CONTENT FROM ACCI_REVIEW WHERE LAW_NO IN (SELECT REF_LNO FROM ACCIDENT WHERE SOLVE = 'Y' AND REF_LNO = (SELECT LAW_NO FROM LAW_USER JOIN MEMBER ON(REF_UNO = USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ?))

SELECT ACC_NO, REF_BNO, REF_LNO, PART_NAME, TITLE, SOLVE FROM ACCIDENT JOIN BOARD ON (REF_BNO = BOARD_NO) JOIN PART_CATEGORY ON (REF_PNO = PART_NO) WHERE REF_LNO IN (SELECT LAW_NO FROM LAW_USER JOIN MEMBER ON(REF_UNO = USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ?) AND SOLVE = 'N'
SELECT CS_NO, CS_TITLE, ACCEPT, CREATE_DATE, CS_ANSWER FROM COUNSEL WHERE REF_LNO = ?
